events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but it doesn't fit at all, and I would like to request a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requested a return and money back due to fitting issues.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund, and Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned to our warehouse?
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday and my order number is 987654321. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the info. We will process your refund within 5-7 business days and notify you once completed.
That sounds good, thank you for your quick response and help with the refund process.
We have now finalized the refund request and the payment will be credited to your account shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance and professionalism.
Closing the case since the refund has been successfully processed and the customer is satisfied.
Sending a satisfaction survey to the customer to gather feedback about their support experience.
